verses.name: Mark 4:21
verses.text: And he said unto them, Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel, or under a bed? and not to be set on a candlestick?

verses.name: Mark 4:22
verses.text: For there is nothing hid, which shall not be manifested; neither was any thing kept secret, but that it should come abroad.

verses.name: Mark 4:23
verses.text: If any man have ears to hear, let him hear.

verses.name: Mark 4:24
verses.text: And he said unto them, Take heed what ye hear: with what measure ye mete, it shall be measured to you: and unto you that hear shall more be given.
